description: Implemented enhanced memory embeddings with tags and file terms. Memory embeddings now include searchable tags (e.g., 'performance', 'indexing') and extracted file terms (e.g., 'embeddings', 'ort_model', 'workspace') from files_changed arrays. Format: '{type}: {description} | tags: {tags} | files: {file_terms}'. Fixed tree-sitter line number prefix stripping bug in JSON array extraction. All 10 embedding tests pass. This enables much better memory search recall - users can now search for 'performance' and find all tagged memories, or 'embeddings' and find memories about work on embedding-related files. Ready to reindex memories to apply new format.
